languages.text: "Я узрела в {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпе{/g} нечто... Необъятное. Хищное. Переливающееся неописуемыми цветами. Оно возникло из ниоткуда и глядело на корабль сотней голодных глаз, встав прямо у нас на пути. Я решила сменить курс, пока это еще было возможно, но не хотела поднимать панику. Неужели было бы лучше сказать команде, что мы летим в зияющую пасть чудовища?"

traits.locale_text: "Я узрела в варпе нечто... Необъятное. Хищное. Переливающееся неописуемыми цветами. Оно возникло из ниоткуда и глядело на корабль сотней голодных глаз, встав прямо у нас на пути. Я решила сменить курс, пока это еще было возможно, но не хотела поднимать панику. Неужели было бы лучше сказать команде, что мы летим в зияющую пасть чудовища?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I saw something in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}. Something... vast. Predatory. Shimmering with indescribable colours. It came from nowhere and stared at the ship with hundreds of hungry eyes, right there in our path. I decided to change the course while it was still possible but did not want to sow panic. Would it have been better to tell the crew we were heading straight into a monster's gaping maw?"
languages.original_text: "Я узрела в {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпе{/g} нечто... Необъятное. Хищное. Переливающееся неописуемыми цветами. Оно возникло из ниоткуда и глядело на корабль сотней голодных глаз, встав прямо у нас на пути. Я решила сменить курс, пока это еще было возможно, но не хотела поднимать панику. Неужели было бы лучше сказать команде, что мы летим в зияющую пасть чудовища?"

traits.locale_text: "There, in the Warp, I saw something... Vast. Predatory. Shimmering with indescribable colors. It came from nowhere and stared at the ship with hundreds of hungry eyes, right there in our path. I decided to change the course while it was still possible but did not want to start a panic. Would it be better to tell the crew we were heading straight into a monster's gaping maw?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

It came from nowhere and stared at the ship with hundreds of hungry eyes, right there in our path. I decided to change the course while it was still possible but did not want to start a panic. Would it be better to tell the crew we were heading straight into a monster's gaping maw?"

traits.locale_text: "I saw something in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}. Something... vast. Predatory. Shimmering with indescribable colours. It came from nowhere and stared at the ship with hundreds of hungry eyes, right there in our path. I decided to change the course while it was still possible but did not want to sow panic. Would it have been better to tell the crew we were heading straight into a monster's gaping maw?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我当时在{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}里看到了某些东西，某些……极其巨大的东西。它掠夺成性，闪烁着无法形容的色彩。它不知从何而来，当时就挡在我们的去路上，数百只饥饿的眼睛盯着这艘船。我当时决定，在不引起恐慌的情况下，想办法改变航线。如果我当时告诉船员们，说我们正直奔怪物的巨口而去，这会不会是更好的做法？”
languages.original_text: "I saw something in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}. Something... vast. Predatory. Shimmering with indescribable colours. It came from nowhere and stared at the ship with hundreds of hungry eyes, right there in our path. I decided to change the course while it was still possible but did not want to sow panic. Would it have been better to tell the crew we were heading straight into a monster's gaping maw?"

traits.locale_text: “我当时在{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}里看到了某些东西，某些……极其巨大的东西。它掠夺成性，闪烁着无法形容的色彩。它不知从何而来，当时就挡在我们的去路上，数百只饥饿的眼睛盯着这艘船。我当时决定，在不引起恐慌的情况下，想办法改变航线。如果我当时告诉船员们，说我们正直奔怪物的巨口而去，这会不会是更好的做法？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Vi algo en la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}. Algo... inmenso. Un depredador. Brillaba con colores indescriptibles. Salió de la nada y miró la nave con cientos de ojos hambrientos. Estaba en nuestro camino. Decidí alterar el rumbo mientras estábamos a tiempo pero no quería sembrar el pánico. ¿Debería haber informado a la tripulación, contándoles que nos dirigíamos a las fauces de un monstruo?».
languages.original_text: "I saw something in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}. Something... vast. Predatory. Shimmering with indescribable colours. It came from nowhere and stared at the ship with hundreds of hungry eyes, right there in our path. I decided to change the course while it was still possible but did not want to sow panic. Would it have been better to tell the crew we were heading straight into a monster's gaping maw?"

traits.locale_text: «Vi algo en la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}. Algo... inmenso. Un depredador. Brillaba con colores indescriptibles. Salió de la nada y miró la nave con cientos de ojos hambrientos. Estaba en nuestro camino. Decidí alterar el rumbo mientras estábamos a tiempo pero no quería sembrar el pánico. ¿Debería haber informado a la tripulación, contándoles que nos dirigíamos a las fauces de un monstruo?».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}で何かを見たのです。何か…広大なものを。捕食者。筆舌に尽くしがたい色彩でゆらめいていました。それはどこからともなくやってきて、何百もの飢えた目で船を見つめていた。あたくしは可能なうちに進路を変えようとしたのですが、パニックを起こしたくはなかったのです。乗組員に、あたくしたちは怪物の大口に向かっているのだと告げたほうがよかったのでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "I saw something in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}. Something... vast. Predatory. Shimmering with indescribable colours. It came from nowhere and stared at the ship with hundreds of hungry eyes, right there in our path. I decided to change the course while it was still possible but did not want to sow panic. Would it have been better to tell the crew we were heading straight into a monster's gaping maw?"

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}で何かを見たのです。何か…広大なものを。捕食者。筆舌に尽くしがたい色彩でゆらめいていました。それはどこからともなくやってきて、何百もの飢えた目で船を見つめていた。あたくしは可能なうちに進路を変えようとしたのですが、パニックを起こしたくはなかったのです。乗組員に、あたくしたちは怪物の大口に向かっているのだと告げたほうがよかったのでしょうか？」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe etwas im {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} gesehen. Etwas ... Enormes. Raubtierartiges. Es schimmerte in unbeschreiblichen Farben. Es kam aus dem Nichts und starrte mit Hunderten hungriger Augen das Schiff an, direkt auf unserem Kurs. Ich entschied, den Kurs zu ändern, solange es noch möglich war, aber ich wollte keine Panik auslösen. Wäre es besser gewesen, der Crew zu sagen, dass wir direkt in den klaffenden Schlund eines Monsters hineinsteuern?"
languages.original_text: "I saw something in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}. Something... vast. Predatory. Shimmering with indescribable colours. It came from nowhere and stared at the ship with hundreds of hungry eyes, right there in our path. I decided to change the course while it was still possible but did not want to sow panic. Would it have been better to tell the crew we were heading straight into a monster's gaping maw?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe etwas im {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} gesehen. Etwas ... Enormes. Raubtierartiges. Es schimmerte in unbeschreiblichen Farben. Es kam aus dem Nichts und starrte mit Hunderten hungriger Augen das Schiff an, direkt auf unserem Kurs. Ich entschied, den Kurs zu ändern, solange es noch möglich war, aber ich wollte keine Panik auslösen. Wäre es besser gewesen, der Crew zu sagen, dass wir direkt in den klaffenden Schlund eines Monsters hineinsteuern?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai vu quelque chose dans le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}. Quelque chose d'immense. De prédateur. Qui luisait de couleurs indescriptibles. La chose était là, sur notre chemin et comme surgie de nulle part, à nous fixer de centaines d'yeux carnassiers. J'ai donc décidé de modifier notre trajectoire tout en évitant de provoquer la panique. Aurait-il été préférable que j'annonce à l'équipage que nous nous dirigions droit dans la gueule béante d'un monstre ? »
languages.original_text: "I saw something in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}. Something... vast. Predatory. Shimmering with indescribable colours. It came from nowhere and stared at the ship with hundreds of hungry eyes, right there in our path. I decided to change the course while it was still possible but did not want to sow panic. Would it have been better to tell the crew we were heading straight into a monster's gaping maw?"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai vu quelque chose dans le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}. Quelque chose d'immense. De prédateur. Qui luisait de couleurs indescriptibles. La chose était là, sur notre chemin et comme surgie de nulle part, à nous fixer de centaines d'yeux carnassiers. J'ai donc décidé de modifier notre trajectoire tout en évitant de provoquer la panique. Aurait-il été préférable que j'annonce à l'équipage que nous nous dirigions droit dans la gueule béante d'un monstre ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Öteboyutta{/g} bir şey gördüm. Geniş bir şey. Yırtıcı. Tanımlanamaz renklerle parlıyordu. Birdenbire ortaya çıktı ve tam yolumuzun üzerinde, yüzlerce aç gözüyle gemiye bakmaya başladı. Hâlâ fırsat varken rotamızı değiştirmeye karar verdim ama paniğe neden olmak da istemedim. Mürettebata direkt olarak bir canavarın açılmış ağzına doğru gittiğimizi söylesem daha mı iyi olurdu?"
languages.original_text: "I saw something in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}. Something... vast. Predatory. Shimmering with indescribable colours. It came from nowhere and stared at the ship with hundreds of hungry eyes, right there in our path. I decided to change the course while it was still possible but did not want to sow panic. Would it have been better to tell the crew we were heading straight into a monster's gaping maw?"

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Öteboyut{/g}ta bir şey gördüm. Geniş bir şey. Yırtıcı. Tanımlanamaz renklerle parlıyordu. Birdenbire ortaya çıktı ve tam yolumuzun üzerinde, yüzlerce aç gözüyle gemiye bakmaya başladı. Hâlâ fırsat varken rotamızı değiştirmeye karar verdim ama paniğe neden olmak da istemedim. Mürettebata direkt olarak bir canavarın açılmış ağzına doğru gittiğimizi söylesem daha mı iyi olurdu?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
